text: Alchornea sodiroi is a species of plant in the family Euphorbiaceae. It is endemic to Ecuador. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist montane forests. ==References== * Santiana, J., Cerón, C. & Pitman, N. 2004. Alchornea sodiroi. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 20 August 2007. Category:Alchorneae Category:Flora of Ecuador Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Alchornea sodiroi
